views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

Displays animated weather wallpaper on the lock screen (The animated backgrounds from the weather app). No noticeable effect on battery life.

Doesn't work with
- HotDog
- ColorFlow
- LockHTML
- swiping with Falcon
- re:scale

Causes issues
- ntspeed
- HideMeX


Configure options from Settings.

- Super improved landscape mode support for the plus models - Added a slider to vertically offset the weather background in landscape mode - temperature and condition can now be shown even with custom or random weather background
- added a switch to support iPhone Plus home screen landscape mode
- various bugfixes and enhancements

- improved logic handling of settings

- Added a slider for horizontal temperature positioning
- Lots of under-the-hood stability fixes
- Added the option to select your own animated weather


- Fixed a bug that caused a crash on iOS 9 with the temperature display.
- Added a slider for vertical positioning of the conditions/temperature


- show weather condition, temperature, high and low on the lock screen.

- Added switches to randomize weather, either randomize on lock/unlock, or with a timer determined by the update interval.

- local city is now cached every time it becomes available, no more respring hassle. Weather for the local city is updated automatically, but the location of the local city is only updated with the weather app or widget.

- lots of stability and reliability improvements

- Added a slider to customize the update interval

- Added a switch to use the first weather app city instead of the local city
- Lock screen and home screen weather can not be independently enabled
- Improved weather updating


- fix for the parallax bug for home screen weather
- added a switch to disable home screen parallax


- Dynamic weather background as a home screen background
- Dynamic weather background on top of own home screen wall paper

- added an option to show weather effects over lock screen background

- added a switch to hide the lock screen time/date
